areas.name: Amboseli National Park
areas.Description: Amboseli National Park is in southern Kenya. It’s known for its large elephant herds and views of immense Mount Kilimanjaro.

areas.name: DIANI SEA RESORT
areas.Description: Diani Beach is a major beach on the Indian Ocean coast of Kenya (in eastern Africa). It is located 30 kilometres (19 mi) south of Mombasa, in Kwale County.

areas.name: Aberdare National Park
areas.Description: The Aberdare National Park is a protected area in the Aberdare Mountain Range in central Kenya located east of the East African Rift Valley.

areas.name: Nairobi National Park
areas.Description: Nairobi National Park is a national park in Kenya that was established in 1946 about 7 km south of Nairobi.

areas.name: Garden City Mall
areas.Description: It is the first of its kind in the country to incorporate shopping, residential and office space into one joint development ingeniously blending work, home and leisure activities.

areas.name: Saiwa Swamp National park
areas.Description: Saiwa Swamp National Park is located near Kitale, in Trans-Nzoia County, Rift Valley Province, Kenya. It is the smallest national park in Kenya.

areas.name: Meru National Park
areas.Description: Meru National Park is a Kenyan national park located east of Meru, 350 km from Nairobi.

areas.name: Watamu
areas.Description: The coastal village of Watamu is known for its wonderful white sand beach. The region is protected as part of the Watamu National Marine Park.

areas.name: Mount Kenya National Park
areas.Description: Mount Kenya National Park was established in 1949 to protect Mount Kenya, the wildlife, and the surrounding environment.

areas.name: Lake Nakuru
areas.Description: Lake Nakuru is one of the Rift Valley lakes, located at an elevation of 1,754 m above sea level. It lies to the south of Nakuru,

areas.name: Samburu National Reserve
areas.Description: The Samburu National Reserve is a game reserve on the banks of the Ewaso Ng'iro river in Kenya. On the other side of the river is the Buffalo Springs National Reserve.

areas.name: Mombasa Marine National Park and Reserve
areas.Description: It is located on the coast near tourist areas and is a popular beach because of the snorkeling and diving; other activities include taking a boat ride.

areas.name: Kenya Lake System
areas.Description: Located in the Great Rift Valley, Kenya, the site features three lakes: Lake Bogoria, Lake Nakuru and Lake Elementaita. A highly diverse population of birds.

areas.name: Fort Jesus
areas.Description: Fort Jesus is a Portuguese fort built from 1593 to 1596 on Mombasa Island to guard the old port of Mombasa, Kenya.

areas.name: Sarova Hotel
areas.Description: Sarova Hotel is under the flagship of Kenya Safari Lodges & Hotels is located in the Kenya's capital Nairobi.

areas.name: Lamu Old Town
areas.Description: The town is the oldest Swahili settlement, and is built in coral stone and mangrove timber.

areas.name: Sacred Mijikenda Kaya Forests
areas.Description: The site comprises eleven forests spread 200 km (120 mi) along the coast of Kenya.

areas.name: Thimlich Ohinga
areas.Description: Thimlich Ohinga Archaeological Site · Entrance at Kochieng enclosure and buttresses at either side for stability ·

areas.name: Koobi Fora
areas.Description: Koobi Fora is a paleoanthropological site in northern Kenya near Lake Turkana. The geological formation of Koobi Fora is made up of the .

areas.name: Nairobi Railway Museum
areas.Description: The Nairobi railway museum, aims to preserve the history of railway development in East Africa by preserving and presenting relics and early records of the time

areas.name: Shimoni Slave Caves
areas.Description: Shimoni’s slave are remnants of the brutal reality of the East African slave trade.

areas.name: Meru Museum
areas.Description: The small museum’s exhibits include the cultural and technological remains.

areas.name: Two Rivers Mall
areas.Description: is the biggest mall in Kenya featuring a plethora of food and beverage outlets, fashion stores, health and beauty shops, banking services, children play areas and massive grade A office space.

areas.name: The Hub Karen
areas.Description: With over 85 retail stores, the mall ensures that all your fine dining, entertainment, fashion and grocery shopping needs are met under a single roof.

areas.name: The Junction Mall
areas.Description: Located at the junction of Ngong Road, Naivasha Road and King’ara Road in Nairobi, the junction has been operating for the past 11 years.

areas.name: Village Market
areas.Description: The Village Market is one of the best malls in Kenya. Located on Limuru Road.

areas.name: Sarit Centre
areas.Description: Opened in 1983, Sarit Centre is easily the oldest shopping mall in Kenya. The mall is located in Nairobi’s Westlands and it offers a 300-seater cinema, food courts and a show space.

areas.name: Villa Rosa Kempinsky
areas.Description: Opened in 2013, this five-star hotel in Kenya, East Africa, offers 201 hotel suites and rooms which are comfortably positioned throughout ten floors

areas.name: Yaya Centre
areas.Description: The facility, which was founded in the late 1980s is today one of the top shopping malls in Nairobi. It hosts more than 100 shops and offices.

areas.name: Westgate
areas.Description: Also located in Westlands, Westgate is a five-storey mall that houses over 90 stores.

areas.name: Nyali
areas.Description: Nyali is renowned for its high tourist potential, as its water is very calm, the accommodation facilities and its white sand beaches and sea that is loved by divers.

areas.name: Pirates
areas.Description: Officially known as Jomo Kenyatta Public Beach, Pirates Beach is a famous beach for many locals and family units

areas.name: Mombasa Beach Hotel
areas.Description: Mombasa Beach Hotel is under the flagship of Kenya Safari Lodges & Hotels is located in the Kenya's North Coast.

areas.name: Hell's Gate National Park
areas.Description: Hell's Gate National Park lies south of Lake Naivasha in Kenya, north west of Nairobi.

areas.name: Hilton Hotel
areas.Description: Experience Kenya from the Hilton Nairobi hotel, situated in the city's central business district,

areas.name: Malindi beach
areas.Description: All beaches of Malindi have white and clean sand. Water here is as clean as possible. Coral reefs that grew close to the shore act as natural filters.

areas.name: Ukunda
areas.Description: Ukunda is a coastal town in the southern part of Mombasa. It paves way into Diani Beach.

areas.name: Serena Hotel
areas.Description: Book your stay at one of Nairobi's best hotels. Our Nairobi hotel is centrally located with lush gardens, 5-star services and elegant accommodation.
